description: Original Broadcast Quality Sony Betamax video tape recorded on Sony Super BetamaxSLHF-450 video recorder at Beta II speed via Audio video cables from the Satelite Receiver bypassing the RF Converter.  Dubbed to TDK EHG (Extra High Grade)  DSP (Digital Satelite Video Tape) VHS SLP via Monster audio / video cable.  From WABC-TV 7 New York via Dish Network
